name: ATV Champs
description:
Put on your helmet, jump onto your ATV and burn the tyres straight away in this special, multi-player edition of the Flick Champions Extreme Sport!

Meet the racers from around the world, challenge them, or take your own, twisty ride.

All-covered in dirt, grab the power-up and make the final jump towards the sun, overtaking your opponent by a freaking inch.

Listen to the whirr of the engine over the sounds of nature... switch, turn, accelerate and do not get knocked out by any obstacle.

We cannot tell you how a decent ride on the all-terrain vehicle should look like - you must define it yourself!


FEATURES:
► Real-time, cross-platform, online multiplayer Endless Racing
► Individual or 2-Player mode
► Instant pick-up and play with easy to master controls
► Modern, High Definition graphics
► Global Ranking of the best (and worst!) Racers
► Lightweight, smooth and User-friendly


Stay tuned for more online multiplayer sporting events, powered by Flick Champions ™!
